name: 2-1B (Too-Onebee) (V)
lore: Made by Genetech. Unusually independent for a droid. Forced to serve a Moff on Firro, but was liberated by Tiree. Now dedicated to serving the Alliance.
text: Once per turn, may place your non-droid character just lost at same or related site in Used Pile instead of Lost Pile. X on Bacta Tank is -2.
